Package monsterfighter.core

Class Battles

java.lang.Object
monsterfighter.core.Battles
public class Battles extends Object
Class that models the construction of the Battle's used in the application.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Battles()
    Creates a Battles object with two list's for WildBattle's and TrainerBattle's.

    • fillBattles

      public void fillBattles(List<Item> allItems, List<Monster> allMonsters, GameEnvironment.Difficulty difficulty, int day, int partySize)
      Parent function that links to the functions that populate the WildBattle's and TrainerBattle's lists.
      Parameters:
      allItems - List of all available Item's
      allMonsters - List of all available Monster's
      difficulty - The GameEnvironment.Difficulty chosen by the user
      day - The current day for the game
      partySize - The size of the Player's party of Monster's

    • fillWildBattles

      public void fillWildBattles(List<Item> allItems, List<Monster> allMonsters, GameEnvironment.Difficulty difficulty, int day)
      Fills the WildBattle's list with WildBattle's based on given parameters.
      Parameters:
      allItems - List of all available Item's
      allMonsters - List of all available Monster's
      difficulty - The GameEnvironment.Difficulty chosen by the user
      day - The current day for the game

    • calculatePoints

      public int calculatePoints(String battleType, int partySize, GameEnvironment.Difficulty difficulty)
      Calculates the correct quantity of points that a Battle should have based on given parameters.
      Parameters:
      battleType - The type of Battle
      partySize - The number of Monsters in the Battle
      difficulty - The GameEnvironment.Difficulty chosen by the user
      Returns:
      The quantity of points for a Battle
